gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਤੳੁ ਪਲਾਸ ਪਤ੍ਰ ਨਾਗਬੇਲ ਮੇਲ ਭੲੇ ਪਹੁਚਤ ਕਰਿ ਨਰਪਤ ਜਗ ਜਾਨੀਅੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Tau Palaas Patr Naagabayl Mayl Bhaay , Pahouchat Kari Narapat Jag Jaaneeai ?
translation: Just as a meritless leaf of Butea frondosa when enjoins a betel leaf can reach the hands of the king and this is known the world over.

gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਤੳੁ ਕੁਚੀਲ ਨੀਲ ਬਰਨ ਬਰਨੁ ਬਿਖੈ ਹੀਰ ਚੀਰ ਸੰਗਿ ਨਿਰਦੋਖ ੳੁਨਮਾਨੀਅੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Tau Koucheel Neel Baran Baranu Bikhai , Heer Cheer Sangi Niradokh Ounamaaneeai ?
translation: Just as blue colour is regarded dirty amongst all the colours, but a dress of that colour when enjoins a diamond is considered flawless and unadulterated.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਲਗ੍ਰਾਮ ਸੇਵਾ ਸਮੈ ਮਹਾ ਅਪਵਿਤ੍ਰ ਸੰਖ ਪਰਮ ਪਵਿਤ੍ਰ ਜਗ ਭੋਗ ਬਿਖੈ ਅਾਨੀਅੈ
transliteration: Saalagraam Sayvaa Samai Mahaa Apavitr Sankha , Param Pavitr Jag Bhog Bikhai Aaneeai ?
translation: Just as a conch is high by impious, being the skeleton of a sea worm, but its sounding at the time of worship of idols, distribution of consecrated offerings and holding of yoga is considered supreme and sacred.

gurmukhi: ਤੈਸੇ ਮਮ ਕਾਗ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਮਰਾਲ ਮਾਲ ਮਾਰ ਨ ੳੁਠਾਵਤ ਗਾਵਤ ਗੁਰਬਾਨੀਅੈ ॥੫੦੧॥
transliteration: Taisay Mam Kaag Saadhasangati Maraal Maala , Maar N Outthaavat Gaavat Gurbaaneeai ?501?
translation: Similarly, a congregation of saintly persons in the presence of True Guru is an assembly of swans where I, person of crow- like temperament indulging in singing of Gurbani not turned out and away.  (501)
